call.name: download
call.call-param: declare variable $doc as node() external; let $isbn10 := $doc//span[@class='isbn10']/span let $isbn13 := $doc//span[@class='isbn13']/span let $title := $doc//span[@property='dc:title'] let $author := $doc//span[starts-with(text()[1],'By (author)')]/span[1]/a let $publisher := $doc//a[@property='dc:publisher'] let $date := $doc//span[@property='dc:available'] let $price := $doc//div[@class='mainDetails']/p[@class='priceBlock']//span[@class='price']/strong return <novel> <isbn10>{data($isbn10)}</isbn10> <isbn13>{data($isbn13)}</isbn13> <title>{data($title)}</title> <author>{data($author)}</author> <publisher>{data($publisher)}</publisher> <year>{substring($date,string-length($date)-3,4)}</year> <vendor>Book Depository</vendor> <cost>{data($price)}</cost> </novel>
